TEXT.S: Don Bielke sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1932, ryax sa tay nqu tay , Don Bielke, squliq na p'unro. Bielke mzyu mari maki Valparaiso Crusaders krau' pqwasan biru. 1954 kawas NBA pspung te spat ,tmwang Wayne Pistons. 1955 1956 kawas, maki Wayne Pistons pitu' pspung. masoq mzyu mari NBA lga,Bielke cbaqan mzyu mari mpuw tzyu' kawas maki California Concordia krahu' pqwasan biru.ru cbaqan mzyu mari mpuw kawas,maki California Lutheran pqwasan biru. raral ga,Bielke cbaqan seto' ru sinisy mpuw kawas nya maki California Lutheran krahu' pqwasan biru. mzyu mari na sinsiy maki krahu' pqwasan biru,1977 1978 kawas pspung ryax ru 1979 1980 kawas pspung ryax,hiya magal blaq . hiya mtzyaw 27 kawas maki krahu' pqwasan biru na mslokah ru sinsiy na kinesiology. 1990 kawas, Bielke magal NAIA te cyugal sqabu. magal kwara Amerika ru maki mzyu mari, maki YMCA na squilq. Don Bielke magal Valparaiso ru San Francisco krau' pqwasan biru
